attributes.action: Reduce the speed limit to 30 MPH on Hastings Road, Battle.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current speed limit is 40MPH within the town limit of this road. This is in a built up area and has houses with drives at the front. The present speed of traffic makes it extremely difficult to pull out on to the road. It is also very dangerous for pedestrians crossing over.
